items.name: Summon Demon (1/Day)
entries: Drivvin magically summons a {@filter demon of challenge rating 6 or lower|bestiary|challenge rating=[&0;&6]|tag=demon|miscellaneous=!swarm}. The summoned demon appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of him, acts as his ally, and can't summon other demons. The summoned demon remains until Drivvin dismisses it as an action or until the demon is reduced to 0 hit points.
